thread.title: Mariah Carey now blames "everyone" for her NYE lip-syncing disaster
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey now blames "everyone" for her NYE lip-syncing disaster

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Mariah Carey now blames "everyone" for her NYE lip-syncing disaster
text:
Remember on New Year's Eve when Mariah Carey had a spot of trouble with her microphones, which resulted in a lip-syncing mishap and a mountain being made out of a molehill? Yeah, Mariah is still having to explain herself and she's now blaming "everyone", which is sort of understandable considering she must be really sick of hearing about it.
"I don't even want to bring this up too much, but whatever, we're obviously talking about it, the New Year's Eve situation â€“ that couldn't be helped," she told Rolling Stone .
 "It's just something where if I can't explain it to the entire world, then they're not going to understand it, because it's not what they do," she added.
"Just like I wouldn't understand somebody who had a desk job and how to do that. I couldn't. I literally am incapable of being in the real world and surviving."
We don't doubt that.
Getty
"I used to get upset by things," she continued. "This was out of my control, and had everything not been such a total chaotic mess, then I would have been able to make something happen.
